remarks: Property of a 3rd atom ` R ` on a line ` P .\/ Q ` intersecting element ` X ` at ` P ` .  (Contributed by NM, 30-Jul-2012.)
statement:
atbtwn.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
atbtwn.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
atbtwn.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
atbtwn.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atbtwn $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ ( R e. A /\ X e. B ) /\ ( P .<_ X /\ -. Q .<_ X /\ R .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) ) -> ( R =/= P <-> -. R .<_ X ) ) $.
